scripts.deploy: cd btcflower-nft/btcflower-nft && dfx deploy --argument '(principal "cbvco-k27pa-dgumq-tjhcq-iqrcx-ayr3z-moywz-jqblc-nvsif-dayv3-4qe")' staging && dfx canister call staging addAsset '(record {name = "privat";payload = record {ctype = "text/html"; data = vec {blob "hello world!"} } })' && dfx canister call staging initMint '(vec {"d542756ca7970b2a1c288cbe0da2c9ae073304329dcdbdfbcd8df19416baf3b0"; "4f9089eb53f60d028b4bdfe7bc1594c907b81324c7dd6f6713121dcb56f80677"; "b4be27cac04a4e2b2e90ca2f55e033092edf53a67a7ed228044eddb3726eb24f"})' && cd ../.. && npm run dev
